resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107506</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107506</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206659</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Revolution and the New Nation (1754-1820s)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umdrehung und die neue Nation (1754-1820s)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Révolution et la nouvelle nation (1754-1820s)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Volta e a nação nova (1754-1820s)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giro e la nuova nazione (1754-1820s)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επανάσταση και το νέο έθνος (1754-1820s)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Revolución y la nueva nación (1754-1820s)</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">includes documents and images for learning about the American Revolution, the Constitution, the creation of the U.S. Navy, Eli Whitney's patent for the cotton gin, Thomas Cooper's violation of the Sedition Act, and the Electoral College.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schließt Dokumente und Bilder für das Lernen 
über die amerikanische Umdrehung, die Beschaffenheit, die Kreation 
des VEREINIGTE STAATEN Marine-, Eliwhitneys Patents für die 
Entkörnungsmaschine, der Verletzung des Thomas Faßbinders der 
Sedition-Tat und des Wahlmänner-Gremiums ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">inclut des documents et des images pour se 
renseigner sur la révolution américaine, la constitution, la 
création du brevet de marine, d'Eli Whitney des ETATS-UNIS pour le 
genièvre de coton, de la violation du tonnelier de Thomas de la Loi 
de sedition, et de l'université électorale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inclui originais e imagens para aprender sobre a 
volta americana, o constitution, a criação da patente da marinha, do
Eli Whitney de ESTADOS UNIDOS para o gin de algodão, da violação do
cooper de Thomas do ato do sedition, e da faculdade electoral.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">include i documenti e le immagini per imparare 
circa la rivoluzione americana, la costituzione, la creazione del 
brevetto del blu marino, di Eli Whitney degli STATI UNITI per la 
sgranatrice, della violazione del cooper del Thomas della Legge di 
sedition e dell'università elettorale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιλαμβάνει τα έγγραφα και τις εικόνες για την 
εκμάθηση για την αμερικανική επανάσταση, το σύνταγμα, τη 
δημιουργία του ΑΜΕΡΙΚΑΝΙΚΟΥ ναυτικού, το δίπλωμα ευρεσιτεχνίας 
Eli whitney για το τζιν βαμβακιού, την παραβίαση του Thomas
Cooper's του νόμου στασιασμού, και το εκλογικό κολλέγιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">incluye documentos y las imágenes para aprender 
sobre la revolución americana, la constitución, la creación de la 
patente de la Marina de guerra, de Eli Whitney de ESTADOS UNIDOS para la 
ginebra de algodón, de la violación del fabricante de vinos de 
Thomas del acto de la sedición, y de la universidad electoral.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206659</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107506</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/revolution-and-the-new-nation-1754-1820s</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
